# NicePrint { #DeToX.NicePrint }

```python
NicePrint(body, title='')
```

Print a message in a box with an optional title.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                    | Default    |
|--------|--------|------------------------------------------------|------------|
| body   | str    | The string to print inside the box.            | _required_ |
| title  | str    | A title to print on the top border of the box. | `''`       |
